aws_dx_hosted_transit_virtual_interface_.description: Provides a resource to manage the accepter's side of a Direct Connect hosted transit virtual interface.

dx_gateway_id.description: The ID of the [Direct Connect gateway](dx_gateway.html

virtual_interface_id.description: The ID of the Direct Connect virtual interface to accept.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the virtual interface.

arn.description: The ARN of the virtual interface.
